description.narrative: Provide conditional food assistance to chronically food insecure households, disaster risk management solutions, economic empowerment to women and technical support to government for the implementation of PSNP.

sector.narrative: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
